name: parameterExists
description: This function is deprecated. Use the IsDefined or StructKeyExists functions. Determines whether a parameter exists. ColdFusion does not evaluate the argument.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code: Using parameterExists, we have shown that the FORM field 'myString' now exists. However, this function is provided for backward compatibility and the function IsDefined should be used instead, as below.
